name: Wan Wan Hanami
description:
Take care of your Plantdoge and see if you can help it reach it's final, blossomy form!ControlsMouse
Click
Drag & Drop
M
Mute / Unmute Audio

Created in January 2022 for the Virtual Pet Jam by Damaskino and Pet Pumpkin

Made with:
- Unity
- sfxr

Packages Used:
- Text Animator
- DOTween Pro
- All In 1 Sprite Lighting
